conversations.english: Could you drive me to the bank?你可以送我到银行吗？
conversations.chinese: 你可以送我到银行吗？
conversations.reply_english: Of course, ma'am. Tell me where to go.当然可以，女士。请告诉我怎么走。
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然可以，女士。请告诉我怎么走。

conversations.english: Miss, where do you want to go?小姐，你想去哪里？
conversations.chinese: 小姐，你想去哪里？
conversations.reply_english: Could you drop me off at the airport?你能送我到机场吗？

title: 下趟公交车什么时候来

conversations.english: Excuse me. When's the next bus?打扰了。下趟公车什么时候来？
conversations.chinese: 打扰了。下趟公车什么时候来？
conversations.reply_english: The next bus will be here in four minutes.4分钟之后，下趟公车就会到这里。
conversations.reply_chinese: 4分钟之后，下趟公车就会到这里。

conversations.english: Excuse me, when is the next train to Los Angeles?打扰了，去洛杉矶的下一趟列车是什么时候？
conversations.chinese: 打扰了，去洛杉矶的下一趟列车是什么时候？

conversations.english: Taxi! Taxi!计程车！计程车！
conversations.chinese: 计程车！计程车！
conversations.reply_english: Where to, sir?先生，去哪里？

conversations.english: Excuse me, I'm a little lost. Which bus do I take to get to Shi Da?请问一下，我有一点迷路了，到师大该搭几路公车？
conversations.chinese: 请问一下，我有一点迷路了，到师大该搭几路公车？
conversations.reply_english: Let's see. From here, you have to take the 278bus.让我看看。从这里你必须要搭 278。
conversations.reply_chinese: 让我看看。从这里你必须要搭 278。

title: 下一趟列车是什么时候

conversations.english: Can I help you?我可以帮你吗？
conversations.chinese: 我可以帮你吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes. When is the next train to New York City?是的。去纽约的下一趟列车是什么时候？
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。去纽约的下一趟列车是什么时候？

conversations.english: Shall we share a taxi?我们合租一辆计程车好吗？
conversations.chinese: 我们合租一辆计程车好吗？
conversations.reply_english: Where are you heading now?你现在要去哪里？

conversations.english: What's the matter?怎么啦？
conversations.chinese: 怎么啦？
conversations.reply_english: Which subway should I take to get to the East Side?我要搭哪趟地铁才能去东区。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我要搭哪趟地铁才能去东区。

title: 这附近有家商业银行吗

conversations.english: Hello. Excuse me. Do you know if there's a Commercial Bank around here?你好，打扰了。你知道这附近有家商业银行吗？
conversations.chinese: 你好，打扰了。你知道这附近有家商业银行吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, go straight along Beijing Road and turn right.是的，沿着北京路直走，然后右转。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，沿着北京路直走，然后右转。

conversations.english: Hi, waiting for the bus? Where are you going?嗨，等车呢？你去哪？
conversations.chinese: 嗨，等车呢？你去哪？
conversations.reply_english: China Hotel.中国饭店。

conversations.english: Oh, no. We’re going to be late for the meeting.噢，糟糕。我们开会要迟到了。
conversations.chinese: 噢，糟糕。我们开会要迟到了。
conversations.reply_english: No. We’ll get a cab. It’s faster than taking the bus or the subway.不会的。我们坐出租车去。那比坐公车或搭地铁快。
conversations.reply_chinese: 不会的。我们坐出租车去。那比坐公车或搭地铁快。

title: 请问你的汽车预约号码

conversations.english: Hello,is this the ABC Company?喂，这是ABC公司吗？
conversations.chinese: 喂，这是ABC公司吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes.May I help you?是的，我能为你服务吗？

conversations.english: Excuse me, how do I get to Wall Street?打扰一下，请问去华尔街怎么走？
conversations.chinese: 打扰一下，请问去华尔街怎么走？
conversations.reply_english: Take the A train south to the Liberty Ave. stop. You should be able to find it from there.坐往南开的A 列车到自由大街站。在那儿你就可以找到了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 坐往南开的A 列车到自由大街站。在那儿你就可以找到了。

conversations.english: Oh, damn. There’s another traffic jam on the highway.哦，真糟糕。路上又堵车了。
conversations.chinese: 哦，真糟糕。路上又堵车了。
conversations.reply_english: How can there be a traffic jam on a 16-lane highway every day?16车道的主干道上怎么可能堵车？
conversations.reply_chinese: 16车道的主干道上怎么可能堵车？

conversations.english: Excuse me,sir.You are not supposed to smoke here.对不起，先生，你不能在这里吸烟。
conversations.chinese: 对不起，先生，你不能在这里吸烟。
conversations.reply_english: I beg your pardon?请你再说一遍好吗？

conversations.english: Hi, taxi.嗨，出租车。
conversations.chinese: 嗨，出租车。
conversations.reply_english: Good morning, Lady. Where do you wanna go?早上好，女士。去哪里？

conversations.english: Take me to this address, please.请把我送到这个地址。
conversations.chinese: 请把我送到这个地址。
conversations.reply_english: Yes, Ma'am.Here we are.是的，夫人。我们到了。

title: 不用换乘No need to change

conversations.english: How can I get to Lakeside Park?去湖畔公园怎么走？
conversations.chinese: 去湖畔公园怎么走？
conversations.reply_english: Take the No.7 bus. There's a bus stop just over there.乘7路车，那边有个站点。

title: 你以前没有坐过公车吗

conversations.english: Hey, buddy, can’t you see there’s a line?嘿，朋友，你没看到有一条线吗？
conversations.chinese: 嘿，朋友，你没看到有一条线吗？
conversations.reply_english: Oh, sorry. I didn’t know.哦，对不起。我不知道。

conversations.english: That looks like a bad accident.好像又出了严重的车祸了。
conversations.chinese: 好像又出了严重的车祸了。
conversations.reply_english: Yeah, should we get out and help?是呀。我们要下车帮帮忙吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 是呀。我们要下车帮帮忙吗？

conversations.english: Take me to this address,please.请把我送到这个地址。
conversations.chinese: 请把我送到这个地址。
conversations.reply_english: Yes,ma'am. Here we are.是的，夫人。我们到了。

title: 我们租的车发生了车祸

conversations.english: Hello.Is this ABC Rent-a-car Company?喂，你是ABC租车公司吗？
conversations.chinese: 喂，你是ABC租车公司吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes,speaking.May I help you?是的，我是，我能为你效劳吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我是，我能为你效劳吗？

conversations.english: Hey, Taxi. Over here!出租车，这儿。
conversations.chinese: 出租车，这儿。
conversations.reply_english: Did you call for a car service你叫车吗？

conversations.english: Taxi.出租车。
conversations.chinese: 出租车。
conversations.reply_english: Yes. Where would you like to go?到哪里？

title: 我买一张去伦敦的车票

conversations.english: A ticket to London,please.我买一张去伦敦的车票。
conversations.chinese: 我买一张去伦敦的车票。
conversations.reply_english: A cheap day return ticket?廉价往返吗？

conversations.english: Come on.Plenty of room upstairs.Fares please!快点!上层还有不少座位.请买票.
conversations.chinese: 快点!上层还有不少座位.请买票.
conversations.reply_english: One to the beach. How much is it?去海滩一张，多少钱？

conversations.english: Excuse me ,is this taxi taken?请问这车有人用吗？
conversations.chinese: 请问这车有人用吗？
conversations.reply_english: No.May I help you?没有，需要帮忙吗？

conversations.english: Drive me to Kennedy Airport,please?请送我去肯尼迪机场。
conversations.chinese: 请送我去肯尼迪机场。
conversations.reply_english: I'm sorry.My car's taken.抱歉，我的车有人约了。

title: 租一辆经济车需要多少钱

conversations.english: How much is it to rent an economy car?租一辆经济车需要多少钱
conversations.chinese: 租一辆经济车需要多少钱
conversations.reply_english: $19 a day or$129 a week, unlimited mileage.19元一天或129元每周，不限里租

conversations.english: Could you take us to the Fifth Avenue?能送我们到第五大街吗？
conversations.chinese: 能送我们到第五大街吗？
conversations.reply_english: Sure.Step in.行，进来吧。

conversations.english: Are you engaged?有人约你的车了吗？
conversations.chinese: 有人约你的车了吗？
conversations.reply_english: No,sir.Can I help you?没有，先生。您要车吗？

title: 去爱丁堡的车票多少钱

conversations.english: How much is a ticket to Edinburgh?去爱丁堡的车票多少钱？
conversations.chinese: 去爱丁堡的车票多少钱？
conversations.reply_english: Single or return?单程还是往返？

conversations.english: Hi, I would like to purchase a one way ticket to Brussels, please.你好，我想买一张去Brussels的票。
conversations.chinese: 你好，我想买一张去Brussels的票。
conversations.reply_english: Certainly sir, this is our train schedule. We have an express train departing every morning and an overnight train that departs at nine pm.好的，先生，这是我们的列车时刻表。每天早晨我们有一趟特快列车出发，晚上有一趟9点的火车.
conversations.reply_chinese: 好的，先生，这是我们的列车时刻表。每天早晨我们有一趟特快列车出发，晚上有一趟9点的火车.

conversations.english: Joy Chain elementary school, please.麻烦去卓成小学。
conversations.chinese: 麻烦去卓成小学。
conversations.reply_english: Will do.好的。

title: 你知道我们坐哪路公车吗

conversations.english: Dad, do you know which bus we should take?你知道我们坐哪路车吗？
conversations.chinese: 你知道我们坐哪路车吗？
conversations.reply_english: Of course, er, let me check the bus schedule first.当然啊，恩，让我先看一下公车牌。
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然啊，恩，让我先看一下公车牌。

title: 我在曼哈顿邮电局下车

conversations.english: Drop me at the Manhattan Post Office.我在曼哈顿邮电局下车。
conversations.chinese: 我在曼哈顿邮电局下车。
conversations.reply_english: Well,that's an hour's ride.Why not just post your mail here.那要开一小时，干嘛不在这儿邮寄呢？
conversations.reply_chinese: 那要开一小时，干嘛不在这儿邮寄呢？

title: 这车有人用吗Is this taxi taken

conversations.english: Is this taxi taken?这车有人用吗？
conversations.chinese: 这车有人用吗？
conversations.reply_english: No, sir. Where to?没有，先生。去哪儿？

conversations.english: Hi, I'd like two tickets to Provindence, please.嗨，我要两张到Provindence的票, 谢谢。
conversations.chinese: 嗨，我要两张到Provindence的票, 谢谢。
conversations.reply_english: Sure,what time will you like to depart?好，您要几点出发的？

conversations.english: Am I in the right direction to the Xidan Book Building?这是去西单图书大厦的车吗？
conversations.chinese: 这是去西单图书大厦的车吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, you are right.对，是的。

title: 下错站Get Off At The Wrong Stop

conversations.english: Dad, where is the Book Building?爸爸，图书大厦在哪里呢？
conversations.chinese: 爸爸，图书大厦在哪里呢？
conversations.reply_english: I'm looking. Can you still remember what the conductor said?我在找啊。你还记得售票员是怎么说的吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 我在找啊。你还记得售票员是怎么说的吗？

title: 买票和问询 Tickets and Inquiries

conversations.english: Daniel, here is some money for the tickets.丹尼尔，给你些钱去买票吧。
conversations.chinese: 丹尼尔，给你些钱去买票吧。
conversations.reply_english: OK, it's my pleasure. How many tickets?好的，我很乐意。要买几张票？
conversations.reply_chinese: 好的，我很乐意。要买几张票？

title: 地铁到西单站还有几站

conversations.english: Dad, hurry! The train is coming. Aha, I am a superman.爸爸，快啊，地铁来了。啊哈，我是超人。
conversations.chinese: 爸爸，快啊，地铁来了。啊哈，我是超人。
conversations.reply_english: Don't rush,behave yourself please! Let the people get off first.不要跑，规矩点！先下后上。
conversations.reply_chinese: 不要跑，规矩点！先下后上。
